resources.string: Like the Air Force UV Reactive Swooshthe Beaverton-based firm is offering a second Air Force 1 with the particularity of change appearance when exposed to light. After 8 hours of use, the colour change fades and the pair returns to its original colour.The Nike Air Force 1 Low 07 LX UV Reactive Multi features a white upper made from a mix of textured and smooth leather. Under the effect of UV rays,the white upper evolves into alternating coloured inserts. Pale yellow, purple and blue tones appear, creating a unique looking silhouette.
